description.lang: The ABUS Z-Wave Smoke detector provides reliable warning of risk of potentially fatal smoke inhalation and sounds an alarm. It's compact design does not compromise the functionality but even convinces with low maintenance due to 5 years ofbattery life. The Smoke detector also includes a test button for manual self-testing, for test alarms and temporary muting.
